short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search many sites directly from address bar using bangs provided by  Evolutionos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search many sites right from address bar using bangs provided by evolution. Click evolution icon next to address bar for more info.
Enhance your search by searching the web faster. With evolution you can directly open the search results on a website.

Search 1000+ websites right from browser's address bar using bangs provided by evolution. A bang or bang-code is a short-code for a website.

Want to search "gangnam style" on youtube?
"! yt gangnam style" is what you need to enter in the address bar. Here "yt" is bang-code for youtube.

Want to search "mountain goat" on wikipedia?
"! w mountain goat". Yes, "w" is for wikipedia.

Get it?

"y" is for Yahoo, "r" is for reddit, "yt" for youtube, and so on.

Similarly you can search hundreds of websites like google, quora, github, wiki, facebook, etc.



- Extremely lightweight extension.
- Does not tracks any of your activity.
- Does not interferes with your default search.
- Saves your time searching the internet.

Note: You need to type, don't copy-paste
